option.name: apache2template
option.defaultvalue:
<VirtualHost {IPADDRESS}:{PORT}>
  ServerName {DOMAINNAME}
  ServerAlias www.{DOMAINNAME}
  ServerAdmin webmaster@{DOMAINNAME}
  SuexecUserGroup {USERNAME} {USERNAME}
  DocumentRoot "{DOCUMENTROOT}"
  Alias /webalizer "{HOMEDIR_PREFIX}/{USERNAME}/webalizer/{DOMAINNAME}"
  ErrorLog "/var/log/syscp/{USERNAME}/{DOMAINNAME}-error.log"
  CustomLog "/var/log/syscp/{USERNAME}/{DOMAINNAME}-access.log" combined
  
  {SSLCONFIG}
</VirtualHost>

option.name: apache2ssltemplate
option.defaultvalue:
<IfModule mod_ssl.c> SSLEngine on SSLCipherSuite ALL:!ADH:!EXP56:RC4+RSA:+HIGH:+MEDIUM:+LOW:+SSLv2:+EXP:+eNULL SSLCertificateFile {SSLCERTFILE} SSLCertificateKeyFile {SSLCERTKEYFILE} SSLCertificateChainFile {SSLCERTCHAINFILE}
<Files ~ "\.(cgi|shtml)$"> SSLOptions +StdEnvVars </Files>
SetEnvIf User-Agent ".*MSIE.*" nokeepalive ssl_unclean-shutdown </IfModule>
